name: Nexus Inferi
description:
Nexus Inferi is a Metroidvania-style game that puts the player in the shoes of a normal college student who's been sucked into the Spirit Realm and been told to save it.

Explore the Spirit Realm, meet lost souls from all walks of life, and stop The Rebel's war against heaven before it can begin. But beware -- alone you are nothing. In order to succeed you'll need to help your spiritual allies remember themselves, and help them finally move on to the next life.

Defeat enemies to help recover your allies' lost memories and improve your connection with them. 

Note: Current version is slightly unstable. If you encounter a bug, returning to the main menu and choosing "Continue" should allow you to continue play.
